original_title: Speaker endorses certificate on 2024 Appropriation Bill, VAT (Amendment) and Finance Bills
original_body_lines: The Speaker of Parliament Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana has endorsed the certificate on the Appropriation Bill for the year 2024, which was passed in Parliament today (13).
Meanwhile, the Value Added Tax (Amendment) Bill and Finance Bill which were passed in Parliament on Monday (11) have also been certified by the Speaker today.
Accordingly, the said Bills will come to effect as the Value Added Tax (Amendment) Act No. 32 of 2023, the Finance Act No. 33 of 2023 and the Appropriation Act No. 34 of 2023, the statement said.
